modules.name: astra-mainsdk
build-commands: /bin/bash -c 'for f in astra-baseSdk/usr/bin/*; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -a "$f" ${FLATPAK_DEST}/usr/bin/; fi; done'
/bin/bash -c 'for f in astra-baseSdk/usr/lib/*; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -a "$f" ${FLATPAK_DEST}/usr/lib/; fi; done'
/bin/bash -c 'for f in astra-baseSdk/usr/include/*; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -a "$f" ${FLATPAK_DEST}/usr/include/; fi; done'
/bin/bash -c 'for f in astra-baseSdk/usr/share/*; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -a "$f" ${FLATPAK_DEST}/usr/share/; fi; done'
/bin/bash -c 'if [ -d astra-baseSdk/lib ]; then for f in astra-baseSdk/lib/*; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -a "$f" ${FLATPAK_DEST}/usr/lib/; fi; done; fi'
/bin/bash -c 'if [ -d astra-baseSdk/lib64 ]; then for f in astra-baseSdk/lib64/*; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -a "$f" ${FLATPAK_DEST}/usr/lib64/; fi; done; fi'
